table.caption: Purple Dragon Knights Renown
rows: The Purple Dragon Knights provide you a {@book Comfortable|XPHB|6|Lifestyle Expenses} lifestyle for free at Purplemont, the faction's fortress in Suzail.
You can hire Cormyrean hirelings for half the usual cost.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 10, the Purple Dragon Knights give you an Uncommon magic item from the Armor or Weapon category.
You are given an honorary Cormyrean knighthood. The royal family of Cormyr is {@variantrule Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly} to you by default.
Amethyst dragons are Friendly to you by default.

You can command a troop of {@dice 1d6} {@creature Knight|XMM|Knights} to help you on a mission or complete one task that doesn't go against the Purple Dragon Knights' core principles. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again until your Renown Score increases.
You are trusted by the Purple Dragon Knights' Great Knight, who confides in you and provides information.

You are asked to take care of an amethyst dragon egg until it hatches. Additionally, you can call on a High Knight to perform a major favor for you, such as granting a private audience with the royal family. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again until your Renown Score increases.
